item.title: Generative Query Expansion
item.description:
Introduction

In many query expansion studies, the primary evaluation depends on its search result. This project tries to provide a second way of measuring QE performance by measuring how many query expansion terms overlaps with ideal expansion terms, where ideal expansion terms are trained from a high performing QE from supervised learning.

Currently

Updating this page.

Acknowledgement

This project is advised by Prof. Cheng Xiang Zhai
